channel.title: Indices on Shared Prayers
channel.description: Recent content in Indices on Shared Prayers

item.title: Shared Prayers
item.description:
Pray the Daily Office

Sunday Liturgies for this month:

  • Holy Eucharist for Sunday, 9 January: Baptism of Our Lord
  • Holy Eucharist for Sunday, 16 January: Epiphany 2
  • Holy Eucharist for Sunday, 23 January: Epiphany 3
  • Holy Eucharist for Sunday, 30 January: Epiphany 4
  • Holy Eucharist for Sunday, 6 February: Epiphany 5

Weekday Liturgies this month:

  • Holy Eucharist for Wednesday night, 5 January (Feast of the Epiphany)
  • Holy Eucharist for Wednesday night, 12 January (Feast of Aelred, Monastic)
  • Holy Eucharist for Wednesday night, 19 January (Feast of the Confession of St. Peter)
  • Holy Eucharist for Wednesday night, 23 January (Feast of the Conversion of St. Paul)
  • Holy Eucharist for Wednesday night, 2 February (Feast of the Presentation)

Liturgies for any week:

  • Holy Eucharist for Weekdays in Covid-tide
  • Holy Eucharist for Major Feasts in Covid-tide

Liturgies for pastoral occasions:

  • Ministration at the time of death for him, for her

Share These Prayers


Invite someone to scan this QR code to pray with you.
